article_title: 'Lady Houdini' hopes to empower with her escape act
article_text:

og.description: FLORENCE, S.C. --- As the sun set slowly Saturday evening, a crowd of people piled into Lady Houdini’s performance area for her 6:30 p.m. show at the Eastern Carolina Agricultural Fair.
